thread.section_title: Eircom Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eircom | www.eircom.net
thread.title: Doris Feeley

author: Doris Feeley
title: Doris Feeley
text: Without a doubt the worst customer care I have ever dealt with, agent got both my email address and phone number wrong and had to repeat my number three times before they got it right. Trying to add a mobile while keeping original number, don't go there... almost a week and still being told it will take 24 hours, was told by one agent it would be completed in 20 mins... that was 3 days ago, supervisors are apparently "in meetings " all day every day. Staff are rude and unhelpful. Just left Vodafone as the reception was bad in our area and have to say their customer care service was excellent with agents constantly keeping in touch... stay away from eir is the best advice I can give!
